Articles.Content:
Having issues with a particular docking port. I've got them docked in orbit, but want them undocked. When I click on them it gives me the option to disable xfeed, control from here and rename port, but not undock or decouple node. Anyone come across this? 

Ive seen all the undocking bugs where the ports don't undock when button is clicked and attempted to fix things that way, but I don't even have the "undock" or "decouple node" option!

please help!

I have Mech Jeb and Docking port aligner installed if that makes a difference
